content: 8 increase cast on 2sts pm for hedgehog s right eye edge marker st st = stocking/ stockinette stitch - knit all stitches on right side purl p to end 10sts all stitches on wrong side row 9 increase kfb k to last st kfb 12sts special techniques cut yarn c join yarn d to work with yarn bd as follows w+t knit row bring yarn to the front of the work slip next st work short row to create the brow as follows purlwise onto the rh needle take working yarn to the back slip the short row 1 p10 w+t slipped stitch back onto the lh needle turn the knitting short row 2 k8 w+t short row 3 purl to end of row w+t purl row take yarn to the back of the work slip next st purlwise cut yarns and leave these 12 sts on a stitch holder onto the rh needle bring working yarn to the front slip the slipped stitch back onto the lh needle turn the knitting hedgehog page 4 hedgehog page 5 hedgehog s left cheek ws facing rejoin yarn ad to 4 sts to complete left cheek as follows with yarn ab cast on 2 sts row 8 purl row 1-2 work 2 row stocking stitch row 9 increase kfb k to end 5sts row 3 increase rs kfb k to end 3sts row 10 purl row 4 purl row 11-12 increase repeat last 2 row once 6sts row 5-6 increase repeat last 2 row once 4sts cut yarns and leave these 6 sts on a stitch holder pm at beginning of last row for hedgehog s left nose marker cut yarn a join yarn c to work with yarn bc as follows hedgehog s right cheek with yarn ab cast on 2 sts work short row to shape the left cheek as follows row 1-2 work 2 row stocking stitch short row 1 k3 w+t row 3 increase k to last st kfb 3sts short row 2 p3 row 4 purl row 5 increase k to last st kfb 4sts short row 3 k2 w+t pm at beginning of last row for hedgehog s right nose marker short row 4 p2 short row 5 k1 w+t cut yarn a join yarn c to work with yarn bc as follows short row 6 p1 work short row to shape the right cheek as follows short row 1 p3 w+t row 7 cast on 2sts k4 pm for hedgehog s left eye edge marker short row 2 k3 cast off last 2 sts 4sts short row 3 p2 w+t pm at beginning of last row for hedgehog s left cheek marker short row 4 k2 short row 5 p1 w+t short row 6 k1 hedgehog page 6 hedgehog page 7 row 6 increase cast on 2sts p6 to end row 4 increase k3 turn cast on 3 sts turn k6 turn cast on 3 sts turn pm at beginning of last row for
